text: Alan Carr (born 14 June 1976) is an English television presenter and stand-up comedian. Carr was born in Weymouth, Dorset, and grew up in Northampton. He presented Channel 4's The Friday Night Project with Justin Lee Collins. Carr is openly gay.Mr nice guy He hosts Alan Carr: Chatty Man. == References == == Other websites == * *Official site Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:British radio personalities Category:British stand-up comedians Category:British television talk show hosts Category:Channel 4 presenters Category:English comedians Category:English LGBT writers Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English television presenters Category:English television writers Category:Gay men Category:LGBT actors Category:LGBT broadcasters Category:LGBT comedians Category:People from Northampton
title: Alan Carr
